detail_desc: V-neck cardigan in an airy, fine-knit viscose blend with a wrapover front with sewn-in ties at the waist, 3/4-length sleeves with gently flared cuffs and ribbed trims around the opening.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft organic cotton textured knit with buttons down the front.
Calf-length coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and long, slightly wider raglan sleeves. Lined.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and concealed button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit wool and nylon blend.
Wide trousers in a patterned, softly draping viscose weave with concealed pockets in the side seams and a high waist with wide, covered elastication.
Knee-length skirt in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button, slit at the front, and front and back pockets.
Calf-length jeans in washed stretch cotton denim with a high waist, small front pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist, buttons down the front and a slit in one side.
Ankle-high slippers in faux fur with appliqués. Pile linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Wide, ankle-length dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow shoulder straps with decorative ties at the top, and a slit at the front.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine knit with a button at the neck.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a back pocket.
Double-layered hairbands in soft jersey with a sewn-on bow.
Hat in a soft, fluffy, rib-knit wool blend with a turned-up hem.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Dressing gown in soft pile with a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Long, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with slits in the sides and no buttons. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Low-necked vest top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Top in a crinkled viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top, both front and back.

Wide dress in an airy, textured weave with a round, gathered neckline, dropped shoulders and short, wide puff sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a drawstring at the waist with narrow ties at the front. Skirt with inset sections at the sides for added volume and a shorter front. V-neck jersey underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Scarf in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a stretch cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
Shopper in soft, supple suede with two handles at the top, decorative seams front and back and a shimmering metallic inside. Unlined. Size 36x52 cm.
Skirt in several layers of tulle with a glittery elastic waistband.
Boots in shimmering metallic leather with a soft shaft and covered heels. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and rounded hem.
Long kaftan in an airy, patterned weave with a drawstring at the waist and slits in the sides. Long sleeves with an opening along the top and a drawstring at the cuffs.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in crinkled chiffon with a shimmering pattern. Concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs with a flounce at the hems. Jersey lining at the top.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Triangle bikini top with overlocked frilled edges, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Flower-shaped earrings in thin metal wire. Diameter 4 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
Thin metal chain necklaces with round, coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length, approx. 43-50 cm and 50-58 cm.
Twill cap with reversible sequins on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in washed linen with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, and buttons down the front.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Imitation suede Captain’s cap. Lined.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Imitation suede jacket with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with a tab and metal buckle. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur cuffs.
Short skirt in woven fabric with flounces. Elastication at the back of the waist and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric in a relaxed fit with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets, and close-fitting ribbed hems with a zip.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Sandals with a braided section at the front and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Soft toy made of soft velour with polyester padding dressed in a removable tulle dress with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Length approx. 23 cm.
Double-layered hat in cotton jersey with a small appliqué at the hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and pockets with a button at the back. Adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details that can be unbuttoned and removed.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ankle-length legs with creases.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details, a sewn-in wrapover at the front, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Scalloped V-neck, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, polo-neck jersey top with long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.

Wide tunic in pattern-weave cotton with a small stand-up collar, opening at the front and ties at the top. Dropped shoulders and long wide sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Tiers and a flounce at the hem.
Tunic in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Imitation suede sandals with covered heels and narrow straps with elastication at the sides. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with short puff sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and an elasticated hem.
Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of trousers in a soft jacquard knit. Jumper with a roll edge neckline, decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline with pleats  and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
5-pocket, striped, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a textured stripe. Wide, elasticated puff sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 1.5 cm.
Blouse in a soft weave with a wrapover front, ties at the waist, flared peplum, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs.

Sleeveless playsuit in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar and concealed press-studs at the top. Flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, side pockets and back pockets. Drawstring at the waist and short legs.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, covered heels, narrow foot straps, a toe post and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Top in airy, patterned chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with frills at the top.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Short jacket in soft pile with a double-layered hood, concealed press-studs down the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
